title: Colm Tóibín Reads Mary Lavin
description: Colm Tóibín joins Deborah Treisman to read and discuss Mary Lavin’s “In The Middle of The Fields,” from a 1961 issue of the magazine.
content:encoded: Colm Tóibín reads and discusses “In The Middle of The Fields,” by Mary Lavin.
